lead_paragraph: Former England goalkeeper Paul Robinson believes Burnley have the character and skill to survive in a much tougher Premier League than the one he played in a decade ago.

headline.print_headline: Burnley Have Talent, Will to Survive in Premier League-Robinson
headline.main: Burnley Have Talent, Will to Survive in Premier League-Robinson

snippet: Former England goalkeeper Paul Robinson believes Burnley have the character and skill to survive in a much tougher Premier League than the one he played in a decade ago....
